tabs.content:
SensorData
| summarize min(Se)

Sensors
| distinct locationOnProduct, sensorType


// All Temp Values
//
SensorData
| lookup Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
// | where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId, sensorType
// | extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
// | summarize avgTemperature=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s), sensorType
| make-series avgValue = avg(toreal(sensorValue)) on EventDateTime step 1s by sensorType
| where sensorType in ("Temperature", "Humidity")
| render timechart with (ysplit=panels)

SensorData
| lookup Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| lookup Material on materialId
| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
| where unit has "C"
// | where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId, sensorType, materialType
// | extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
// | summarize avgTemperature=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s), sensorType
| make-series avgValue = avg(toreal(sensorValue)) on EventDateTime step 1s by materialType
// | where sensorType in ("Temperature", "Humidity")
| render timechart with (ysplit=panels)



external_table('product')
| take 10

Sensors
| take 10

ZavaSensors
| take 10

PerformanceMetric
| take 10

Material
| distinct materialType

Material
| distinct materialName

inventory
| take 10

| lookup  Sensors on sensorId
| join kind=inner external_table('product') on productId
| lookup Material on materialId
| take 10

Sensors
| take 10

ActivityType
| take 10


| extend EventDateTime = datetime_utc_to_local(EventProcessedUtcTime, 'US/Pacific')
| where EventDateTime > datetime_utc_to_local(ago(5m),'US/Pacific') 
// | where unit has "C"
| where productType == "Footwear"
| project EventDateTime, sensorValue, sensorId,productId, sensorType
// | extend sensorValueReal = todouble(sensorValue)
// | summarize avgTemperature=avg(sensorValueReal) by bin(EventDateTime, 1s)
| make-series avgValue = avg(toreal(sensorValue)) on EventDateTime step 1s by sensorType

.show queries
| where State == "Failed"
| top 1 by LastUpdatedOn
